text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Court" means a court of competent jurisdiction of the State, whether or not a court of record.

"Person in emergency management service" means a person who, during the emergency period to which this subtitle is applicable, is a member of or works for the Maryland Emergency Management Agency or a local emergency management organization.

"Person suffering injury or damage" means a person who, during the emergency period to which this subtitle is applicable:
suffers serious personal injury;
suffers extensive damage to property owned by the person; or
has an immediate family member who:
dies;
suffers serious personal injury; or
suffers extensive damage to property owned by the family member.
